items.content_html:
This thing is a new Family Tree Chart for the Photo Family Tree template. A fan chart is a creative display of a person‚Äôs direct ancestors. FamilySearch.org has a fan chart view, which this thing is based on. If you want to create a fan chart but don‚Äôt want to enter your family information on FamilySearch, then you might like this.

This chart shows the ancestors of a single person in your family tree. The chart looks like this,

The template can be cusomized. Here is an example in with a water color style.

To create the chart you‚Äôll need Inkscape and an extension Next Generator. Both are free!

Follow along to make your own.

There are 2 parts to the Fan Chart Template.

  1. a Google Sheets Template where the family tree data is saved
  2. an Inkscape Scabalbe Vector Graphic (SVG) file.

1. Get a Copy of the Family Tree Fan Chart Google Sheets template

Copy the Google sheet Photo Famly Tree with Fan Chart template to your Google Drive. Use the ‚ÄúPeople‚Äù tab to enter you family tree information. Watch this video to learn how to get started.
Create a Photo Family Tree with Google Sheets and yEd

Add Fan Chart to Existing Spreadsheet

If you already have a family tree template you can add the ‚ÄúFanChart‚Äù tab.

  • Right click on the ‚ÄúFanChart‚Äù Tab.

  • Select ‚ÄúCopy To‚Äù

  • Then select the spreadsheet to add the sheet to.

2. Create the Fan Chart Diagram in Inkscape
